doc.previous: Another equivalent for graded lattices condition is Birkhoff s condition
doc.after: In domain theory it is natural to seek to approximate the elements in a partial order by much simpler elements This leads to the class of continuous posets consisting of posets where every element can be obtained as the supremum of a directed set of elements that are way below the element If one can additionally restrict these to the compact elements of a poset for obtaining these directed sets then the poset is even algebraic Both concepts can be applied to lattices as follows
